list.question: What is the basis for obtaining a petition to issue an investor visa?
list.answer: Membership of the applicant in the Council of Foreign Investors under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan; - possession of an investment contract concluded with the authorized body for investments; - possession of recommendations from state bodies or quasi-governmental sector entities confirming the implementation of an investment project by the applicant on the territory of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
